means: 怒吼，咆哮，大声喊出( roar的现在分词)

word_mean: 喘鸣症：吸气(有时在呼气)时发出粗声的一种马病，系呼吸道稍有阻塞或声带麻痹所致

sentence.Network_en: The Doberman let out a string of roaring barks.
Salesmen of unofficial souvenirs have also been doing a roaring trade.
sentence.Network_cn: 出售非官方纪念品的推销员的生意也很红火。

sentence.Network_en: He could hear a sudden roaring. His blood froze.
sentence.Network_cn: 他听到突如其来的一声吼叫，吓得魂不附体。

entry.def: A roaring fire has large flames and is sending out a lot of heat.
If something is a roaring success, it is very successful indeed.

example.ex: The government's first effort to privatize a company has been a roaring success.
example.tran: 政府首次实行公司私有化的努力获得了巨大的成功。

entry.tran: 做成一笔大买卖;售出大批货物;生意兴隆
entry.def: If someone does a roaring trade in a type of goods, they sell a lot of them.

example.ex: Salesmen of unofficial souvenirs have also been doing a roaring trade.
example.tran: 出售非官方纪念品的推销员的生意也很红火。

means.word_mean: 2. a very loud utterance (like the sound of an animal);
2. loud enough to cause (temporary) hearing loss

auth_sentence.content: A rip-roaring...affair of incessant movement and high good spirits.
auth_sentence.res_content: A rip-roaring...affair of incessant movement and high good spirits.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A rip-roaring...affair of incessant movement and high good spirits.

auth_sentence.content: Should commitment falter, polio will come roaring back.
auth_sentence.res_content: Should commitment falter, polio will come roaring back.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Should commitment falter, polio will come roaring back.

auth_sentence.content: A...spate roaring a furlong broad after the rains.
auth_sentence.res_content: A...spate roaring a furlong broad after the rains.

sentences.en: While the train was passing,a roaring sound greeted our ears.
sentences.cn: 火车通过时,我们听到了轰隆声。

sentences.en: It’s a poor teacher who can only control the class by roaring at the children.
sentences.cn: 只会靠向孩子吼叫来维持秩序的老师是无能的。

sentences.en: The roaring sea gradually calmed down.
sentences.cn: 咆哮的大海逐渐平静下来。

sentences.en: Our roaring guns left the enemy trembling with fear.
sentences.cn: 我们的隆隆炮声使敌人胆战心惊。

sentences.en: His films haven’t exactly been a roaring success, have they?
sentences.cn: 他的那些电影并不是非常成功,是吧?

sentences.en: a dark shed, lit only by the glow of roaring furnaces
sentences.cn: 只见燃烧的炉火的黑暗工棚

sentences.en: She threw more wood into the stove and soon the fire was roaring.
sentences.cn: 她又在炉子里添了些柴,火很快就呼呼地烧起来。

sentences.en: Toy shops do a roaring trade just before Christmas.
sentences.cn: 圣诞节前玩具商店生意火爆。

sentences.en: The musicians were such a roaring success that they have been asked to stay for an extra week.
sentences.cn: 音乐家们的表演取得了巨大成功，并因此被挽留多呆一周。

sentences.en: His films haven’t exactly been a roaring success, have they?
sentences.cn: 他的那些电影并不是非常成功，是吧？

sentences.en: They came home roaring drunk again last night.
sentences.cn: 昨天晚上他们回家时又喝得酩酊大醉。
